arts.ttl: Glasgow go top after Hibs lose and Celtic hold Rangers
arts.sum: Glasgow City move to the top of the Scottish Women's Premier League after Hibernian lost to Heart of Midlothian while Rangers and Celtic fought out a 1-1 draw.

arts.ttl: Hibernian equal club record unbeaten run with thumping win over Dundee
arts.sum: Rocky Bushiri got the hosts up and running.

arts.ttl: Kieron Bowie sets sights on catching Steve Clarke's eye as Hibs hotshot dreams of Scotland chance
arts.sum: And the 22-year-old concedes it will not be until next season Hibs fans see the best of him as he plays catch-up in his bid to regain peak fitness. Asked if Wilson’s call-up gives him hope of future recognition Bowie, who has made just three Premiership starts this season, told the Daily Record : “Yeah, definitely.

arts.ttl: Clark Robertson keen to avoid more relegation heartbreak with Dundee defender out to stop rampant Hibs in their tracks
arts.sum: The veteran centre-half knows all about the pressures of being in a team at the wrong end of the table and is determined to avoid the drop this season

arts.ttl: Kieron Bowie targets Scotland call-up as fit again Hibs frontman insists 'you haven't seen the best of me yet'
arts.sum: Bowie has caught the eye for the Hibees after recovering from a serious hamstring problem that kept him out of action for four months

arts.ttl: What channel is Hibs vs Dundee? Start time, TV, live stream, ref, VAR and team news for Premiership clash
arts.sum: The capital club are coming off the back of a massive 2-0 win at Ibrox while The Dees saw off St Mirren by the same score line

arts.ttl: Preview: Hibernian vs. Dundee - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Scottish Premiership clash between Hibernian and Dundee, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
Tom Hill has provided a score prediction for all six matches in the Scottish Premiership this weekend.
